column3: freddie dewayne pickett age 51 of whitwell
column6: 2015. he was preceded in death by his mother
column7: geneva sanders pickett. mr. pickett was a machine operator for over 25 years at seymour manufacturing. those left to cherish his memories are his wife
column9: brittany shea (ricky) louallen of sequatchie; sisters & brothers
column13: vickie deforest; several nieces and nephews. family will receive friends 2-8pm
column19: 2015 in the funeral home chapel with rev. sam long officiating. interment at whitwell memorial cemetery.
